message: We're a recently funded, stealth mode, mobile startup - a b2b business, but with a cool consumer-facing feel. We're innovating, and going after big ideas. If you're interested msg me here. We're looking for developer types, mobile, web, but would love to see what talent is out there.
I am interested. Can it be a part time basis?
I'm a startup cofounder too, from Italy. Web & mobile dev. Interested in parttime work, to continue to work on my startup. Can be interesting for you? My websites www.tugulab.org
@william I've written to you an email ;)

this is interesting, you're doing geofencing with iOS? I've been working with their CoreLocation framework for region monitoring in the past 2 months and have bad luck with it.. did you implement your geofence algorithm, just curios
hey @william, just sent you an email, I will be in SF next week, I have been working on the same space you are in, would like to get together and talk shop
@william Resume attacched. So I hope to hear news about you soon. Bye
I hope you're still hiring next year... I'll be working on my startup for the summer
Hey  @equinox his company is TappLocal (earlier Jumpfox?). Read here http://techcrunch.com/2010/08/24/tapplocal/

@equinox  @ccarnino  @thesteve -- awesome guys, thanks for the email. I'll be travelling for the next week and a half, but I'll be sure to get back to all of you. @equinox you're right, its crap. We have greatly expanded our offerings since that TC article @ccarnino point out, but location is still an important feature of what we're doing. If you haven't already, please be sure to include a resume in your mailer. Thanks again everyone for your interest.
